body: Bondage art is good though the overall variety is lacking. Im just going to assume the bully got a blackeye under that eyepatch and nothing worse under her clothes besides bruises.
FINALLY THIS GUY GETS MORE TRANSLATED STUFF
@AIZunknown, jaraxxus Thanks i'll check them out. But i probably have already seen a lot of their stuff.
Also Urthemiel, Himitsu has a very good and clean art with bondage themed...a lot are unavailable in EN yet however but that's it from my collection.

Yeah can vouch for Inoue Yoshihisa, if you're looking for vanilla bondage, that's your guy for MOST of his work. Arachnomania also sometimes does consensual bondage. If you're looking NTR or rape bondage though, this guy, Nagiyama and Nightmare Express are the premiere artists for that.

Urthemiel, there is a kind like what you're looking for. You can find some from Inoue Yoshihisa, his/her art are almost always bondage themed and there are some with consent that I'm sure you'll like. Another one I know is Puyocha, though not much but the art is really good. Kumoemon has a lot of bondage themed, while some are nice...a lot of them have NTR/rape so you have to be thorough when searching. You just have to search hard enough.

Sighhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I wonder if i'll ever see some decent bondage again? Consent included, caring for his sub dominant, and no nutjobs would be like literal heaven....
